p: COP26 in Glasgow came at a pivotal time in history. The implication of the climate crisis and reliable energy flows and the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic alongside the rise of nationalism, and soaring geopolitical tensions, tangibly impact security, contribute to rising energy prices, and increases the pressure on young women and men. With 8 years to go to achieve Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), it looks like collectively and individually, we are falling short.
